DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion localize RCC treat partial nephrectomy To consider eligible participate study , patient must meet inclusion criterion list : ≥ 18 year age . Have primary suspect diagnosis RCC , presence cT12 renal mass diagnostic CT assessment . Scheduled partial nephrectomy renal mass . Expected survival least 3 month . Written inform consent available . ECOG ≤ 1 ( Appendix G ) . Negative serum urine pregnancy test within 24 hour female child bear age Recovered toxicity prior therapy ≥ grade 1 . Inclusion criterion advance RCC treat radical nephrectomy To consider eligible participate study , patient must meet inclusion criterion list : ≥ 18 year age . Have pathologic suspect diagnosis RCC presence cT14 renal mass evidence nodal metastatic involvement diagnostic CT assessment Scheduled radical nephrectomy lymph node dissection . Expected survival least 3 month . ECOG ≤ 2 . Negative serum urine pregnancy test within 24 hour female child bear age . Recovered toxicity prior therapy ≥ grade 1 Written inform consent available . Exclusion criterion localize advanced RCC History anaphylactic reaction , severe allergy , allergy folate . Brain metastases Baseline GFR < 50 mL/min/1.73m2 ) Hepatic toxicity ≥ Grade 2 ( use CTCAE version 4 standard definition ) . Participation another investigational drug trial either concurrently 30 day prior surgery Any medical condition opinion investigator could potentially jeopardize safety patient , limit patient 's ability complete study , and/or compromise objective study .
